Class SingleVisualInterfaceViewPart

  • java.lang.Object
    • ViewPart
      • org.eclipse.scada.vi.ui.user.SingleVisualInterfaceViewPart
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ViewManager, ViewManagerContext, ViewManagerListener

    public class SingleVisualInterfaceViewPart
extends ViewPart
implements ViewManager, ViewManagerContext
    A view part which holds a set of views and navigation controls
